trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o evento de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked" /> de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventHandler> delegado, você identificar o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, until you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, até que você remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> class, with multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> sections defined, to display a label on a form.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> classe com vários <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> seções definidas para exibir um rótulo em um formulário.

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A> properties to customize the look of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo mostra a configuração de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A> propriedades para personalizar a aparência do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> is specified using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: A primeira <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> é especificado usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Additional links are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Links adicionais são adicionados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: The example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked> event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox> for other links.
trans-unit.target: Os identificadores de exemplo de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked> evento iniciando o navegador da Web de hiperlinks e exibindo um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox> para outros links.
